entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Val-des-Monts

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
